answers.answer: If you think you have but don't want to tell anyone until your sure go to the pharmacy and ask for ketone testing strips. You don't need a prescription. If you have ketones you probly have it.

question: Im doing a project for my health class on diabetes and how it affects teens and it kinda got me to thinking about how i hav some of the symtons for type 1 diabetes and its kinda scaring me a little....i was just wondering if you could tell me what to do! im also kinda scared to tell mi mom tht i might hav it cuz she might not beleive me and worse not take it serious cuz if i av it it could be serious and OMG im rambling....sorry, im a little freaked...I know you might think im just some crazy teenager trying to get attention but im not so please do not take mi question as a joke.Yours Truely,OliviaP.S. If you hav any information for mi project it would be greatly appreciated, thank you.
title: do i have it???
